title: From QE to QT: How Changing Federal Reserve Policy Affects You
description: Torsten Slok, chief economist at Apollo Global Management, joins Barron’s senior writer Lisa Beilfuss to discuss rate increases, quantitative tightening and what it means for investors.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Torsten Slok, chief economist at Apollo Global Management, joins Barron’s senior writer Lisa Beilfuss to discuss rate increases, quantitative tightening and what it means for investors.
